page.title: 12CLUBS (UNIFORMED)
page.content: {Guides and Brownies Brownies for girls under 11 and Guides for girls over 11 years of age both meet in Ullesthorpe School Hall on Wednesday evenings.The Brownies work for badges and certificates, and go swimming and take a cycle proficiency test.They also go on an annual camp.They also play games such as "Poddy 1,2,3" and "Farmer and the thief".Guides develop the work of the Brownies at a more senior level. { Cubs and Scouts Several boys attend Cubs and Scouts which meets weekly at the Scout camp near Ullesthorpe Court.
